①不孕(sterility):指没有受孕能力,即育龄夫妇长期同居,性生活正常,未避孕而未能怀孕,是由于精子或(和)卵子的异常,或生殖道的障碍.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin sterilis; related to Greek steira 'barren cow'. Sense 2 dates from the late 19th cent

entry.def: Something that is sterile is completely clean and free from germs.

example.ex: He always made sure that any cuts were protected by sterile dressings...
example.tran: 他总是坚持要用无菌纱布包扎伤口。

entry.def: A person or animal that is sterile is unable to have or produce babies.
A sterile situation is lacking in energy and new ideas.

example.ex: Too much time has been wasted in sterile debate.
example.tran: 在毫无新意的辩论上已经浪费了太多时间。

means.word_mean: 2. free of or using methods to keep free of pathological microorganisms;
3. deficient in originality or creativity; lacking powers of invention;

auth_sentence.content: People are already getting sick from being too sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content: People are already getting sick from being too sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People are already getting sick from being too sterile.

auth_sentence.content: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.

auth_sentence.content: These are sterile, so will not spread from seed.
auth_sentence.res_content: These are sterile, so will not spread from seed.

means.word_mean: 不生育的, 不能生殖的

sentences.en: Male workers were made permanently sterile by this pesticide.
sentences.cn: 这种杀虫剂使得男性工人终生不育。

sentences.en: A mule is a sterile animal.
sentences.cn: 骡子是不能生育的动物。

sentences.en: This top fits over the bottle and keeps the teat sterile.
sentences.cn: 这个盖子严实地盖在奶瓶上，保持奶嘴无菌。

sentences.en: An operating theatre should be a sterile environment.
sentences.cn: 手术室应该是个无菌的环境。

sentences.en: The farmers turned the sterile land into high fields.
sentences.cn: 农民们把不毛之地变成了高产田。

sentences.en: the increasingly sterile debate on constitutional reform
sentences.cn: 越来越乏味的宪法改革争论

sentences.en: Their relationship had grown sterile over the years.
sentences.cn: 随着岁月的流逝，他们的关系变得了无生气。

sentences.en: a sterile attempt to reach agreement
